backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining user profiles, KYC, payout methods, withdrawals, and gift card rate types with authorization and storage mixins, plus initial KYC submission and query functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old actor state to new actor state by adding an empty giftCardRates map.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON placeholder.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files describing utilities, components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide outlining build and deployment steps, required tools, environment variables, and common troubleshooting tips.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting all UI, state, and validation requirements for the betting top‑up flow implementation.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist detailing required UI sections, components, and state handling for the crypto wallet dashboard.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the frontend app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main app layout, handling authentication, registration flow, profile setup checks, and routing to all pages.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend actor interface with access-control initialization and role‑assignment methods.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Wraps admin-only routes, showing loading or access-denied states based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Displays a loading screen while Internet Identity authentication initializes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Provides the login UI using Internet Identity with error handling and informational dialogs.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Renders a single crypto transaction row with icons, timestamp, amount, and status badge.
Loads, filters, and displays crypto-related local transactions with tabs and real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Shows the crypto dashboard header with total balance and a visibility toggle.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Renders quick-action buttons for send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer operations.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Lists crypto tokens with balances and icons, allowing optional click handling per token.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: Bottom sheet for selecting a crypto asset and USD amount to create a pending buy transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Sheet that lets users select a crypto asset, view a mock address, copy it, and logs a placeholder receive transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Form for choosing an asset, entering a destination address and amount, and submitting a pending send transaction.
Multi‑step flow for entering an amount, selecting or adding a payout method, and submitting a withdrawal request.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: UI for swapping one crypto asset for another with mock rates and logging a pending swap transaction.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Promo card showing a global connectivity message with an illustration and dot indicators.
Reusable dashboard tile component showing an icon, label, optional badge, and click behavior or coming‑soon state.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Renders a clickable gift card brand row with icon fallback handling.
Displays a limited set of label badges with a counter for remaining tags.
Provides UI to add, remove, and save editable gift card labels.
Implements a popover-based filter bar for selecting and clearing label filters.
Shows a card with NGN rate tiers for a specific gift card brand.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Displays an inline NGN rate summary or unavailable message for a matched tier.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom-sheet picker that filters and selects gift card brands via search.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Renders a transaction row with icons, status badge, timestamps, and formatted amounts.
frontend/src/components/kyc/DocumentSign: Canvas-based signature overlay allowing drawing, stroke tracking, and exporting on top of an image.
Provides the main app layout with desktop sidebar, mobile header, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Renders a fixed mobile bottom navigation dock with route-based active state and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/payout/NigerianB: Implements a searchable dropdown to select Nigerian banks using a popover and command list.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a basic user profile with name input and async profile creation.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable card component representing a bill payment category with icon and keyboard support.
frontend/src/config/__tests__/nigerianBa: Empty test file placeholder for Nigerian banks configuration tests.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines betting providers and preset amount chips for betting-related UI or logic.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Contains conversion rate config and a helper to calculate gross, fees, and net values.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Provides a catalog of gift card brands with search metadata and icon paths, plus filtering.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines Nigeria gift card rate tables, brand overrides, and helpers for tier matching and formatting.
frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts: Exports a list of Nigerian banks and utilities for normalized text search filtering.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Defines vendor data with rates and fees and provides functions to compute payouts and choose the best vendor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports the hook for fetching the caller’s user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, cards, withdrawals, tags, and transactions into a unified dashboard data object.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRegister: Ensures authenticated users are registered in backend access control, handling retries and role assignment.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Tracks browser notification support and permission state and provides a method to request permission.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal in‑app notification preferences stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Stores and retrieves whether a user has dismissed the profile-setup prompt using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides data‑fetching and mapping helpers for profiles, KYC, withdrawals, gift cards, and related backend conversions.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Provides quick access to the user’s primary wallet balance and currency.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides class merging, currency formatting, and date formatting helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGiftCardRa: Provides an admin interface to list, create, edit, and toggle activation status for gift card rate entries using dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Allows admins to search users by principal ID, review their KYC records, and update KYC statuses while displaying related documents and status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Displays pending withdrawal requests for admins to approve or reject, with status updates and loading indicators.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with balance, shortcuts, and promo sections, loading state, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary behavior.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Computes the NGN rate tier for a brand and amount by parsing input and matching against rate tables.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form for adding new gift cards with brand selection, currency, image upload, and automatic NGN rate tier computation.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Shows detailed gift card info, allows updating status and tags, and displays rate tables for the card’s brand.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Displays all gift cards with tag-based filtering, loading states, and navigation to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Ranks and displays gift cards by best NGN rate, showing top cards and handling empty or loading states.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Calculates best NGN rates for gift cards and returns a deterministically sorted ranking list.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Allows selling a specific gift card by calculating rates, selecting vendors, validating input, and showing conversion info.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows transaction history loaded from local state with live updates and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Handles KYC submission including file upload, signature capture, validation, and status display.
Form page to purchase airtime by selecting provider, entering phone and amount, and logging a local transaction.
Handles betting top‑ups with a two‑step form, validation, confirmation, and local transaction logging.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Renders a bills dashboard with category tiles that navigate to specific service pages.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Provides a placeholder form for cable TV bill payments, logging a mock transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Displays a mock crypto wallet with balances, tokens, activity, and action sheets for send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Implements a placeholder mobile data purchase form that records a mock transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Contains a placeholder electricity bill payment form that logs a mock transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: Provides a placeholder internet bill payment form that logs a mock transaction.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for authentication info and notification preferences tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: React page for viewing withdrawal requests, managing payout methods, and submitting new withdrawal requests with currency handling.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Manages localStorage-backed temporary transaction records with add, load, and clear utilities.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Handles per-principal notification preference storage in localStorage with safe get/set helpers.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Defines app-level TypeScript types for users, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC, payouts, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Declares TypeScript types for environment variables injected by Vite.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config defining aliases, env shims, build chunking, dev server proxy, and optimization settings.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking schema version, goals, and requirements for adding a gift card rates backend system.
